text: I thank God for Little Seeds Preschool. It was Godâ€™s miracle that my kids get to enrol into LSP. Their old school was full after returning from a short stay in overseas. Any their blessed learning begins. I was delighted when I overheard them saying prayer before their sleep, saying grace before meals and singing Gospel songs on their accord. They learnt to appreciate and gratefu in their young minds. Thank you LSP.

We would like to thank the teachers and staff at the school for taking care of the children and ensuring their well-being.

Personally, we have seen our child grow up with a positive attitude, and he enjoys his pre-school life.

Formerly was attending Little green house@478 . Changed to little seed preschool which is more lively and child is learning well. More teachers and admin staff to handle admin. Highly recommended Preschool.
This is a lovely school. The staff and teachers are caring and loving while also instilling discipline and order.
